Notice:

Water Bills are due by the 10th of each month.  If you did not receive your bill, call City Hall at 979-793-4253 to get your bill amount.     |     View the 2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide for the Houston-Galveston Region.     |     Water Bills are due by the 10th of each month.  If you did not receive your bill, call City Hall at 979-793-4253 to get your bill amount.     |     View the 2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide for the Houston-Galveston Region.

Upcoming Events

Needville Draining Master Plan - City Hall Meeting

Come join us at City Hall on December 16, between 5:30 and 7:30, to hear about the results from the first Drainage Master Plan for the City. This will be an opportunity to understand the efforts taken to assess flood risks within the community and how they can be addressed in the future.


Feel free to come and go as you please during this time and ask questions and share your drainage experiences. 

When To Attend

Date: December 16, 2025

Time: 5:30PM - 7:30PM
